com.google.appinventor.components.runtime
Class HVArrangement

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.VisibleComponent
      com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidViewComponent
          com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.HVArrangement
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, ComponentContainer
Direct Known Subclasses:
HorizontalArrangement, VerticalArrangement
public class HVArrangement
extends AndroidViewComponent
implements Component, ComponentContainer

A container for components that arranges them linearly, either horizontally or vertically.

Author:
sharon@google.com (Sharon Perl)

$add

public void $add(AndroidViewComponent component)
Description copied from interface: ComponentContainer
Adds a component to a container.

After this method is finished executing, the given component's view must have LayoutParams, even if the component cannot be added to the container until later.

Specified by:
$add in interface ComponentContainer
Parameters:
component - component associated with view
